english.segment1: Well it's time to head out. Gotta find my place to rest. Before the sun goes down. In the darkness of the west
english.segment2: If I rest my head. Would I have to lay upon the stone. If I rest my head. would I lay to rest alone
english.segment3: Well it's time to head out. Gotta find my place to rest. Before the sun goes down. In the darkness of the west
english.segment4: If I climb those stairs. Will I find my way back to home?. If I climb those stairs. Would I find my way alone?. Alone.. Alone..
english.segment5: ..(There must be something real).. ..(There must be something more)..
english.segment6: I'm searching, searching. There must be something real. Searching, searching
english.segment7: If I rest my head. Would I have to lay upon the stone. If I rest my head. would I lay to rest alone. If I climb those stairs. Will I find my way back to home?. If I climb those stairs. Would I find my way alone?. Alone.. Alone..
